name.ja: <ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>奏<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>協<rt>きょう</rt></ruby><ruby>奏<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>曲<rt>きょく</rt></ruby>

text.en: Fusion Summon 1 Fairy Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand, field, and/or Pendulum Zone as material. If a "Melodious" Fusion Monster(s) is sent to your GY while this card is in your GY, even during the Damage Step: You can place this card on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Melodious Concerto" once per turn.
